item.title: Let's Stop Talking About The '30 Million Word Gap'
item.description:
Dublin Core

Title

Let's Stop Talking About The '30 Million Word Gap'

Description

Podcast about the so called 30-million word gap, how racial bias can effect studies and how we might need to rethink assumptions about early childhood education

Source

https://www.npr.org/sections/ed/2018/06/01/615188051/lets-stop-talking-about-the-30-million-word-gap

Language

english

Identifier

Early Childhood Education

item.title: The nation is focused on students and gun violence. But kids in urban schools want to know, where’s everybody been?
item.description:
Dublin Core

Title

The nation is focused on students and gun violence. But kids in urban schools want to know, where’s everybody been?

Description

This is a critique of the recent florida gun movement, because this has been happening in urban schools for years, why have the media not covered this sooner?

Source

https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/the-nation-is-focused-on-students-and-gun-violence-but-kids-in-urban-schools-want-to-know-wheres-everybody-been/2018/03/12/3a506ff4-2633-11e8-bc72-077aa4dab9ef_story.html?utm_term=.fe02bc4b3c4a

Identifier

guns in schools, racism
